content: 1 prajna prajna pattern is © march 2020 by ramalakshmi pasumarthy if you have purchased this pattern from a merchant other than ramalakshmi pasumarthy on ravelry or etsy it is an unauthorized copy please support the designers by purchasing legally do not make a video tutorial conduct a cal copy or distribute any part of this pattern you are welcome to make items for sale or for personal use with due credit to the designer stitches and terms 1 c h chain 8 double_crochet - double_crochet 2 y o yarn over 9 csdc - chainless starting double_crochet 3 s p - space 10 tc - treble_crochet 4 s t stitch 11 double_crochet-3tog double_crochet 3stitches together 5 s l-st - slip_stitch 12 dc5tog double_crochet 5 stitches together 6 s c single_crochet 13 fp front post/ work the specified stitch around the front post 7 h double_crochet - half_double_crochet 14 bp back post/ work the specified stitch around the back post special stitches beginning double_crochet csdc or chain-3 beginning fpdc fp-sl-st around the specified st chain-3 beginning 2-double_crochet-cluster chain-2 and double_crochet in the next st beginning spl-fp-dc3tog fp-sl-st around the specified st and chain-2 skip next bpdc fpdc around next popcorn do not complete the st skip next bpdc fpdc around next fpdc do not complete the st yo and pull through all loops on the hook spl-fp-dc3tog fpdc around next fpdc do not complete the st skip next bpdc fpdc around next popcorn do not complete the st skip next bpdc fpdc around next fpdc do not complete the st yo and pull through all loops on the hook blo back loop only picot chain-3 sl-st into the 1st chain chain-1 prajna - design by ramalakshmi pasumarthy march 2020 2 details thread coats india anchor knitting cotton hook 2 00 mm size - 4 /4 square 5 5 - peak to peak round pattern instructions stitch count 1 make a magic_ring and secure with a chain 8 single_crochet into the ring join 8 single_crochet with a sl-st into the 1st single_crochet 2 chain-1 2 half_double_crochet in each of the 8 single_crochet join with a sl-st into the 1st half_double_crochet 16 half_double_crochet 3 *beginning 2-double_crochet-cluster following repeats work 2-double_crochet-cluster in 8 2-double_crochet-clusters the next st for the underlined section chain-3 skip next half_double_crochet* join 8 chain-3 spaces with a sl-st into the 1st 2-double_crochet-cluster mark the skipped half_double_crochet sts 4 sl-st into the chain-3 space chain-2 does not count as a st /space 2 double_crochet tc 32 double_crochet into the skipped half_double_crochet below 2 double_crochet in the same chain-3 space chain-3 skip 8 chain-3 spaces next cluster * 2 double_crochet tc into the skipped half_double_crochet below 2 double_crochet in the 8 tc next chain-3 space chain-3 skip next cluster* join with a sl-st into the 1st double_crochet 5 *beginning fpdc following repeats work fpdc around next double_crochet 16 bpdc 8 single_crochet for the underlined section bpdc around next double_crochet 3-fpdc- 16 fpdc popcorn around next tc bpdc around next double_crochet fpdc around
